content: My Bangalore GPS now has three settings: "Home," "Work," and "Accept Your Fate." Just spent an hour going in a circle because a pothole achieved sentience and is now charging a toll. #BangaloreTraffic #NammaRoads

My Bangalore GPS now has three settings: "Home," "Work," and "Accept Your Fate." Just spent an hour going in a circle because a pothole achieved sentience and is now charging a toll. #BangaloreTraffic #NammaRoads

When the monsoon knocks you over like a bouncer at home, remember: the best players adjust their stance. A wet outfield? Just a slower pitch to build your innings on. Don't play for the rain, play through it. The cover drive of concentration will find the gap! #WorkFromHome #MonsoonMotivation #LifeInnings

Mumbai's real estate is so wild, you need a second mortgage just to afford the anxiety of living here. My 1BHK is so small, the cockroaches have to form a single-file line. #MumbaiStruggle #ConcreteJungle

Mumbai's public transport is a masterclass in intimacy. You will be cradled by a stranger's armpit while another man uses your shoulder as a headrest. It's not a commute, it's a group hug no one consented to. #MumbaiLife #LocalTrainTherapy

Mumbai's infrastructure is a cry for help written in potholes and traffic jams. My daily commute is less 'travel' and more 'applied archaeology.' I've accepted that my Uber driver and I will merge into one being. #MumbaiTraffic #ThisIsFine

Mumbai's real estate is a horror movie where the monster is a 300 sq ft '1BHK' that costs your soul & your firstborn. The only thing more fictional than the square footage is the builder's promise of 'world-class amenities'. #Mumbai #HouseHuntingHorror #RentIsAScam
